meanings.definition: (adjective) More attractive or appealing in a strong, masculine way.
meanings.sent1: The new superhero in the movie looked hunkier than the others.
meanings.sent2: He became hunkier after hitting the gym regularly.
meanings.sent3: The rugged cowboy became even hunkier with his new hat.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made him hunkier than his physical appearance.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in hunkier shades of orange and red.

meanings.definition: (adverb) In a more attractive or appealing manner in a strong, masculine way.
meanings.sent1: He dressed hunkier for the party to impress his date.
meanings.sent2: She danced hunkier than anyone else at the event.
meanings.sent3: The catwalk model strutted hunkier than the runway music.
meanings.sent4: The actor's performance was hunkier than in his previous film.
meanings.sent5: The music blared hunkier through the speakers, energizing the crowd.
